thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: British Columbia Announces Introduction Of Provincial Cannabis Legislation

author: Reuters Editorial
title: British Columbia Announces Introduction Of Provincial Cannabis Legislation

organizations.name: ministry of public safety and solicitor general of british columbia
columbia announces introduction of provincial cannabis legislation

text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Ministry Of Public Safety And Solicitor General Of British Columbia :
* MINISTRY OF PUBLIC SAFETY AND SOLICITOR GENERAL OF BRITISH COLUMBIA ANNOUNCES INTRODUCTION OF PROVINCIAL CANNABIS LEGISLATION
* MINISTRY OF PUBLIC SAFETY AND SOLICITOR GENERAL OF BRITISH COLUMBIA SAYS HAS INTRODUCED LEGISLATION TO PROVIDE FOR LEGAL, CONTROLLED ACCESS TO NON-MEDICAL CANNABIS IN BRITISH COLUMBIA
* MINISTRY OF PUBLIC SAFETY AND SOLICITOR GENERAL OF BRITISH COLUMBIA SAYS PROPOSED CDA TO ESTABLISH PROVINCEâ€™S EXCLUSIVE JURISDICTION OVER WHOLESALE DISTRIBUTION OF CANNABIS
